Our social media campaign aimed at spreading good around you by taking up one good deed a day.
Just follow 4 simple steps:

1. Register yourself at 
http://tinyurl.com/30daysofgoodness
2. Do good deed a day for the people around you
3. Click and post photos, videos or just write about what you did on your Facebook wall for 30 days with ‪#‎leadersfortomorrow‬ ‪#‎30daysofgoodness ‬‪#‎day‬(no.)

4. Continue doing a good deed for 30 days
